group_1.textLeft: Okay, now for my Super Strike!
What, c’mon!@This move ain’t working!

group_1.textRight: I see, Sis,@you’re still not very good with joysticks, huh?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Argh…!
For real…@I coulda won that battle right there…

group_1.textRight: Pffft!@A win by one single frame~[chara:102301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102301:cheek_0][chara:102301:face_mtn_ex_063.exp.json]

group_1.textLeft: Ugh…@This piece of SHIT controller!!

group_1.textRight: Wait, Sis!@Don’t freaking BREAK it?!

group_1.textLeft: Juri, Ao,@it's all well and good to get heated about games,
but keep in mind there are real battles@ahead of us, understand…?

group_1.textRight: Yep, we're about to start our attack on@the Magical Girls of Kamihama soon.

group_1.textLeft: I know, right?@How damn lazy of you two.

group_1.textRight: Mm-hm.

group_1.textLeft: Anyways, Juri, gimme that controller.
As Ryuugasaki’s member,@I gotta pay back what I owe.

group_1.textRight: Ooh!@As Janomiya’s leader, I too refuse to be defeated!
Uhh.@What was that about games and laziness…?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, hang on a sec.@It's my old man.

group_1.textRight: What, your dad?@Aw, can’t that wait?
If I were you, I’d totally just leave him on blue-tick,@dad or not.
Not like I got stuff to talk to@oldass dudes about anyways.

group_1.textLeft: Maybe you don't, but I do, 'kay?
He's the only family I got, back at our place.

group_1.textRight: Perhaps you two get along so well@because you're close in age?
Oh yeah? How old's he?

group_1.textLeft: Juri the Great was born when he was 19, so…@I guess he's 35 now?

group_1.textRight: [chara:304401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Say what?@No way, I’m so jelly!
Being so close in age, you two must find it@real easy to talk to each other!

group_1.textLeft: Everything else's regular though, I reckon.
Like, all he wanted to tell me's that the pork cutlet@I cooked turned out great.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What, Juri, you actually cook?!@Now that’s wayyy more shocking!

group_1.textLeft: Yo, Horsey, don’t be rude.
…That said, I admit I'm only doing it@'cause we gotta cut costs, yeah.
By the way, I wonder if having a cutlet means@he’d have an important match today?

group_1.textRight: Match?

group_1.textLeft: Juri's father does boxing,@if I remember correctly.
Yep, he ain’t no professional,@but he’s still burnin’ to fight.
‘Specially today, ‘cause he’s playing against some@guy from his old gym who he’s cut ties with.
Heard he’s all fired-up ‘cause things’ve been@real messy between them, [chara:102401:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102401:cheek_0][chara:102401:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:102401:lipSynch_1]heehee.

group_1.textRight: So, it’s exactly BECAUSE they’re ex-friends@that he’s so determined not to lose!

group_1.textLeft: You bet!

group_1.textRight: …Cutting ties with a former associate, huh?

group_1.textLeft: It’s in the blood, isn’t it…

group_1.textRight: I guess…

group_1.textLeft: Huh, what d’you mean…?

group_1.textRight: Former teammates competing against each other, that’s just like Yuna and Juri…

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right, wasn't Ryuugasaki a@breakaway faction from Torayamachi?
I heard Big Sis and Sister were originally@in the same group.

group_1.textRight: Right, but then they split up,@leading to the Blood Tragedy of Futatsugi.
As much as I don’t want to, I still remember…@on the day Juri left me, we—

group_1.textLeft: Hey, shut it, ‘kay?!@Was like, halfway on accident anyway…

group_1.textRight: But afterwards, you got serious in@a blaze of desperation, remember?

group_1.textLeft: …I don’t deny that, but…

group_1.textRight: Come on, I wanna know what happened!

group_1.textLeft: What?
No you don't, Lil' Sis.@It's too damn painful for you to hear.

group_1.textRight: But, isn’t that the start of the whole tragedy
that me and Ranka were caught up in…?

group_1.textLeft: Listen, there was a lot going on there—@it's complicated…

group_1.textRight: Hrmmph…

group_1.textLeft: Alright, I get it…
But, in that case, Sis and Sakuya@oughta tag along, too.

group_1.textRight: Well, sure.

group_1.textLeft: It’d be hard to tell that story all by yourself…
